title: tg refuses to exit gracefully
body:
I was trying to sync, and now I want to restart because it is days and it seems to never finishes..
Full log of this run [tg.log](https://github.com/ledgerwatch/turbo-geth/files/5393801/tg.log)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/224810/96299076-e208c200-0fc9-11eb-9217-46804e8fce9d.png)
Its still using lots of disk
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/224810/96299058-d7e6c380-0fc9-11eb-860a-c53f39a47326.png)
